accessibility.user: What are some fun activities to do around?
accessibility.assistant: You're in Bangladesh! There are plenty of exciting activities to do here. Why not explore the vibrant markets of Old Dhaka, like the famous Chawkbazaar or New Market? You can haggle for souvenirs, try street food, and soak up the local culture. If you're looking for some adventure, take a boat ride on the Buriganga River or go hiking in the nearby hills. You can also visit the beautiful temples and mosques, like the Lalbagh Fort or the Baitul Mukarram National Mosque. Whatever you choose, you're sure to have a blast in Bangladesh!
